import React from "react"; import { CustomCard } from "@tsamantanis/react-glassmorphism"; import "@tsamantanis/react-glassmorphism/dist/index.css"; import "../../assets/style/circleRating.css"; import { StarOutlined } from "@ant-design/icons"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; export default function Detail() { const { thongTinChiTietPhim } = useSelector((state) => state.phimReducer); return (

{thongTinChiTietPhim.tenPhim}

{thongTinChiTietPhim.ngayKhoiChieu}

{thongTinChiTietPhim.moTa}

50%
); }
